title: Brave Summarizer takes on Bing and ChatGPT at the AI search results game

title: Microsoft Edge will start letting you upscale crappy low-res videos online

title: Amazon getting into PC components is the wrong answer to a serious problem

title: Hatch Bank says 140,000 customers had data stolen after breach

title: Akamai beefs up cloud storage offering with acquisition

title: Dell warns of a "challenging" year ahead for the PC market
description: After a decent start to 2022, Dell PC shipments fell sharply, and the company now predicts a tough year ahead.

title: I tried the smart glasses that could replace your phone – here's what I learned
